segments.text: How do you think a manager should react to an employee â€™ s unsatisfactory work ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If I were a manager , I would have a private talk with this employ to figure out the reasons . It is very important to have this one-to-one discussion in an unthreatening situation without any distraction .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Exactly , I overheard a manager scold his employee in the elevator this morning , they were from the company on the 12th floor , I guess . They were only three of us in the elevator , I felt very embarrassed to be in the middle of them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I guess the employee would feel more embarrassed and probably angry . Anyway , it is not wise at all to give a harsh time to your employee in front of others , especially strangers .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure , no matter what happened , they should wait to discuss in their office and find the solution in a positive way .
segments.speaker: S1
